comment.author: 13814149@N02
comment._content: Roberts correct name is 'Robert Mackreth Russell'. His middle name is not 'Marcetti'. His middle name is the surname of his mother Jane Mackreth. Robert is the brother of Henry Chamberlain Russell the astronomer and Bourn Russell the Harbour Master of Eden and half brother to William Bourn Russell Watson who was a member of the Legislative Assembly of NSW.  Their father also a Bourn Russell was also a member of the Legislative Assembly.
